Name: Wizard of Hunting Life
About the game: Wizard of Hunting Life is an action RPG game. Hunt to level up, earn money to buy equipment and challenge stronger enemies. Adventurer's Guild You can receive quests in the Adventurer's Guild. The number of quests you can receive will increase by clearing the quests and increasing the adventurer rank. Skill system You will get skill points as your character's level goes up. By using skill points, you can raise the skill level from the skill window. blacksmith At the blacksmith, you can use the money you get from the quest to buy equipment. Please equip the purchased equipment from the inventory window.
